# UICollectionLayoutListConfiguration.HeaderMode.none

**Case**

No headers are shown.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Header modes

- **UICollectionLayoutListConfiguration.HeaderMode.supplementary**: A header mode that uses supplementary views to show headers.
- **UICollectionLayoutListConfiguration.HeaderMode.firstItemInSection**: A header mode that styles the first item in a section as a header.

items.description: A header mode that uses supplementary views to show headers.
items.name: UICollectionLayoutListConfiguration.HeaderMode.supplementary
